nodes.text: The Glitch were a splinter faction of the criminal Droid Gotra syndicate. The group ordered that a droid uprising take place on the planet Coruscant that would involve a shipment of sham Xrexus Cartel restraining bolts. The bolts were discovered by the Coruscant Security Force, leading to Inspector Tanivos Divo opening a case file on the cartel at some point prior to the cartel's disappearance in around 29 BBY.
The Glitch were mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
